item.title: Elle Fanning reveals at the #THRRoundtable that she once lost out on a role at 16 because she was told she was “unf—kable.”
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
A Lionel Messi docuseries has been greenlit at Apple TV+.
In his own words, Messi tells the definitive story of his career with the Argentina national football team, providing an intimate and unprecedented look at his quest for a legacy-defining World Cup victory.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Ayo Edebiri reveals she is developing her own TV shows.
“I’m developing my own shows, and I have ideas in this weird little head of mine. I love collaborating and I love watching things that are challenging and make me feel things.”
(https://hollywoodreporter.com/tv/tv-features/jenna-ortega-elle-fanning-comedy-actress-roundtable-1235507685/…)
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title: The Lipstick-Face Demon returns in ‘INSIDIOUS: THE RED DOOR.’
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
“Zack said, ‘If you ask me to make this less than 2 hours, I’m going to lose all the character. You won’t care about these people. It’s a character story about how people can change, and redemption…’ So he said, ‘What if I give you two movies?’”
(https://vanityfair.com/hollywood/2023/06/zack-snyder-exclusive-first-look-rebel-moon?utm_source=twitter&utm_social-type=owned&utm_medium=social&utm_brand=vf&mbid=social_twitter…)
item.author: FilmUpdates
